code: import Resizer from"react-image-file-resizer";export var resizeFile=function resizeFile(file){return new Promise(function(resolve){Resizer.imageFileResizer(file,1100,700,"JPEG",100,0,function(uri){resolve(uri);},"base64");});};export var dataURIToBlob=function dataURIToBlob(dataURI){var splitDataURI=dataURI.split(",");var byteString=splitDataURI[0].indexOf("base64")>=0?atob(splitDataURI[1]):decodeURI(splitDataURI[1]);var mimeString=splitDataURI[0].split(":")[1].split(";")[0];var ia=new Uint8Array(byteString.length);for(var i=0;i<byteString.length;i++){ia[i]=byteString.charCodeAt(i);}return new Blob([ia],{type:mimeString});};
